item.title: OSX Lion and jumping through a few hoops
item.description: If you haven’t yet upgraded to Lion (slow-coach you !), you might want to read these: How to burn your own install dvd for OSX Lion You didn’t read this before you installed lion, did you? Then, follow this thread.
